name: Timberland Snowblades Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
description:
Blaze a trail through the snow in these reliable winter boots. They’re made with waterproof leather from a Leather Working Group recognized tannery and have a waterproof-breathable membrane to add an extra layer of defence from slush and melting snow. The sturdy soles have deep lugs for trction on slick surfaces.Premium waterproof leather is from an LWG Silver-Rated tanneryWaterproof membrane keeps you dry in rain, snow and slush.PrimaLoft insulation uses 60% recycled material.Outsoles are 34% recycled rubber, and lugged for maximum traction.

        Sustainability
